assessmentQuestionVersion.name: XLHBurosumab_InitialRenewal_INITIATION_CRITERIA_Q5
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Patient has confirmed phosphate-regulating endopeptidase homolog, X-linked (PHEX) gene variant in either the patient or in a directly related family member with appropriate X-linked inheritance. PLEASE ATTACH CONFIRMATORY REPORT ON THE NEXT SCREEN
